title: Super Bowl LIV MVP Odds Breakdown, Andy Reid vs. Kyle Shanahan (Football 1/22)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and John Breech to discuss Raheem Mostert's incredibly story (3:30), Super Bowl LIV MVP odds (10:30), and the coaching matchup between Andy Reid and Kyle Shanahan (17:30). If he wins next week, is Reid a top 5 coach of all time? The guys also analyze the Packers' problems and how much blame Aaron Rodgers should shoulder (31:30), as well as the importance of the Senior Bowl for teams like the Bengals (45:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
